comment:
This was done using whole cone Chinooks from a three year old bine in our garden.  The hops were harvested, dried and vacuum sealed.  The result was a delicious and super clean/clear beer.
To do it again, I'd crush the cones prior to dry-hopping and leave them for at least 10 days.  When these were pulled, lots of lupulin glands still visible and not in the beer.
